nodes.bodyText: why is this test not running on Zowe?
I believe that it is because the deployment on CA32 doesn't contain the necessary files
Version endpoints shows versions "Unknown" even files aren't exist.
Yes, but then the success path in the tests fails.
Maybe the version test for success would make sense in the Nightly builds? There we have the full Zowe instance.
this is because when zowe tests are run, a different verification mechanism is used?

nodes.bodyText:
Yes, they are run at the moment by a person and there were issues with the startUpCheck there.
It verifies the availability of the Discoverable Client which isn't in the environment.
